Contents: @degr4ssi Hello! Do you know if your router is putting out a 2.4ghz signal or a 5ghz signal? Older models of PS4 won't pick up the 5ghz signal. I suggest checking that, and then try to reset your router for at least a few minutes, then turn it back on. ^DB

Contents: @My_CINTRONics Totally understand. Disconnect your console from the power source for 3 minutes, reconnect it try again. You will hear the first beep, meaning the PS4 is powering on. Continue to hold the Power button and after about 7 seconds, you will hear a second beep, indicating Safe mode.
